title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Mezzaro in a multicolored design on a white ground. Floral sprays and slender vines in an allover pattern. Secondary floral design in small black dots. Double floral border.
